name: Boot-Up Corporal - Command Dynamo
desc: You can target up to 2 Machine "Gadget" monsters you control or in your GY with different names; Special Summon this card from your hand, then equip those targets to this card (regardless of their Type). You can only use this effect of "Boot-Up Corporal - Command Dynamo" once per turn. Gains 1000 ATK for each monster equipped to this card by this effect.
